physical_appearance:The image shows a colour photograph. It features a lady. She is standing up and posing sideways
 looking towards the direction where the photograph was captured. She is wearing her ethnic costume
 with a turquoise top and a brown lower garment with flowery designs. There are also red garlands tied around her hair. The background of the photograph shows greenery and trees.
